name: Sweet Reversi
description:
Outsmart your friends and take all of their macaroons for yourself in this tasty take on the reversi game. Stay on your toes, strategize and make sure you are always thinking several steps ahead as you trap your opponent’s macaroons and turn them into yours in this deliciously fun puzzle game.

Play alone or with a friend on a single PSP® system.

Download Sweet Reversi today!
